answers.answer: Lol.  I'm 31 weeks and my baby girl is already 4lbs. 9oz. according to the ultrasound.  I don't have gestational diabetes either.  Doc doesn't think I'll make it to 40 weeks because of her size and my book pressure.  Good to know that there others that have large babies as well.

I am 32 weeks and my baby boy is already at 5 lbs.  I'm expected to have a 8-9 lb baby.  I didn't expect him to be 5 lbs.  I was expecting 4 lol.  He's gonna b a hoss.  Apparently n already has a head full of hair.  Whew....

question: I'm 33+4 weeks today and I just found out (through ultrasound) my baby boy is sitting breech and already 7 lbs 1 oz... midwife says he still has time and room to flip so I'm not too worried but dang I wasn't expecting that...at least I'm not feeling so pathetic for already waddling and being so uncomfortable!...and no I don't have gestational diabetes...I just happen to be 5'10 and my husband is 6'5 so it's not too much of a shocker...anyone else out there that will be birthing a toddler at 40 weeks
title: Big Breech Boy!
